title: Obnoxiously Complicated Executioner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to investigate each night. You will learn whether or not they are a member of the Town.
- Choose a player to become your target at night. If they are hanged , you will win. You may only do this once.
- Choose a player to execute at night. If they're a member of the Town, they will be dealt an Unstoppable attack. You may only do this after your target has been hanged, and once you successfully execute a member of the Town, you may no longer execute.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you choose someone that isn't a member of the Town as your target, you will commit suicide and lose.
- If your target dies through any means other than hanging, you will commit suicide and lose.
- You have a layer of Basic defense that can block one attack.
- Roleblock and redirect immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that your target is hanged, and then successfully execute someone.

desc:
Post 132
*And thus I posit that it should hold infallibly clear that the crimes with which the defendant had been charged had indeed been committed by them and no other.*
